section.p: Identifies the person who informed the authorites of the decedent's death.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] relationToDecedent with data type String
Specifies the relationship between the person who informed the authorites of the decedent's death to the decedent.
Contains exactly one [1..1] person, where its type is Person

Contains exactly one [1..1] relationToDecedent with data type String
Specifies the relationship between the person who informed the authorites of the decedent's death to the decedent.
Contains exactly one [1..1] person, where its type is Person
